caption.p: Number of samples taken in each 0.25° cell from 1977–2013. Black lines demarcate regions referred to in this paper, which are labeled by black arrowed text. White text marks locations of other features referenced. Figure was created by the first author in MATLAB v2015b (https://www.mathworks.com/products/matlab.html) using the package ‘M_Map’ v1.4 h (https://www.eoas.ubc.ca/~rich/map.html).
